body_html:
OK, I understand your motivation.
Just to clarify PyPy C-Python API support. That's true that the compatibility is pretty high, but it comes with limitations: speed and GC (it's slow, not jitted and it goes through simulation layers).

body:
OK, I understand your motivation.
Just to clarify PyPy C-Python API  support. That's true that the compatibility is pretty high, but it comes with limitations: speed and GC (it's slow, not jitted and it goes through simulation layers).
